newsitem.title: ESTONIA: BOURSE CLOSING - BULLRUN RUNS OUT OF STEAM.
newsitem.headline: BOURSE CLOSING - BULLRUN RUNS OUT OF STEAM.

text.p: * Preliminary data from the Estonian bourse on Wednesday put
total trade at 79.4 million kroons versus 102.2 million kroons
* The Talse online index lost 0.60 percent to close at
269.87 (See index on stock exchange web site:
* Main news items was Rakvere meat plant , suspended
by the stock exchange pending insider trading investigations.
* Preliminary closing data put Forekspank as the
most active stock on trade of 28.2 million kroons to shed 0.50
kroons for a last deal price of 190.50 kroons
* Hansapank turned over 10.8 million kroons to be
0.60 kroons lower on a last deal price of 144.50 kroons
